channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 由于梅西的影响仍在继续，北京取消了阿根廷友谊赛
item.description: Argentina's friendly against Ivory Coast, scheduled to be held in Beijing in March, has been cancelled, the Chinese city's football association said on Saturday, following a backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in a match in Hong Kong.翻译:中国足协周六表示，原定于三月在北京举行的阿根廷对阵科特迪瓦的友谊赛已被取消，此前梅西未能参加在香港的比赛引发了强烈反对。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: JSW 集团将在印度东部设立近 50 亿美元的电动汽车项目
item.description: India's JSW Group will set up electric vehicles and battery manufacturing projects in the country's eastern state of Odisha at a cost of 400 billion rupees ($4.82 billion).翻译:印度JSW集团将在该国东部奥里萨邦建立电动汽车和电池制造项目，耗资4000亿卢比（48.2亿美元）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报道新年假期开始时出现中国气球
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Saturday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, two of which flew across the island, in an uptick of activity at the start of the Lunar New Year holiday.翻译:台湾国防部周六表示，在过去 24 小时内发现了 8 个中国气球穿越台湾海峡，其中两个气球飞越台湾岛，农历新年假期开始时活动有所增加。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 乌克兰援助法案在美国参议院取得进展
item.description: The U.S. Senate on Friday edged closer to passing a bill that includes $95.34 billion in aid for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan, but faces an uncertain path to becoming law due to Republican opposition in both chambers of Congress.翻译:美国参议院周五接近通过一项法案，其中包括向乌克兰、以色列和台湾提供953.4亿美元的援助，但由于参众两院共和党的反对，该法案的成为法律面临着不确定的道路。
item.author: David Morgan

item.title: TikTok 输掉了暂停欧盟看门人地位的法庭诉讼
item.description: ByteDance's TikTok has lost its bid to suspend its designation as a gatekeeper, which makes it subject to onerous obligations under EU rules, after Europe's second top court dismissed its request because it failed to show the urgency for such a move.翻译:字节跳动旗下的 TikTok 在暂停被指定为看门人的申请中失败，这使其根据欧盟规则承担繁重的义务，此前欧洲第二最高法院驳回了其请求，因为它未能表现出采取这一举措的紧迫性。
item.author: Bart Meijer, Foo Yun Chee

item.title: 巴伦在卡塔尔​​凭借后九洞的出色表现取得领先
item.description: Haydn Barron hit five birdies on the back nine to card a five-under-par 67 and take a two-shot lead after the second round of the Qatar Masters on Friday.翻译:海顿·巴伦 (Haydn Barron) 在后九洞抓到 5 只小鸟，打出 67 杆，低于标准杆 5 杆，在周五的卡塔尔大师赛第二轮比赛后取得两杆领先。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 华南城表示 2024 年 10 月票据付款可能出现违约
item.description: Property developer China South City Holdings said on Friday it is likely to default on the mandatory redemption payment due on Feb. 9 for its 9% Senior Notes due October 2024, citing depressed sales and cash flow.翻译:房地产开发商华南城控股周五表示，由于销售和现金流低迷，该公司可能会拖欠2月9日到期的2024年10月到期的9%优先票据的强制赎回付款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 巴斯夫因权利记录审查退出中国新疆合资企业
item.description: BASF said on Friday that it would sell its stakes in two joint ventures in the Chinese region of Xinjiang, where human rights groups have documented abuses including forced labour in detention camps.翻译:巴斯夫周五表示，将出售其在中国新疆地区两家合资企业的股份，该地区的人权组织记录了包括拘留营强迫劳动在内的虐待行为。
item.author: Ludwig Burger

item.title: 美银美林投资者在本周至周三抛售美国股票，买入中国股票
item.description: Investors dumped U.S. and real estate shares and bought Chinese stocks in the week to Wednesday, a report from Bank of America citing data from EPFR said on Friday, saying the China flows were likely driven by Chinese public funds.翻译:美国银行周五援引 EPFR 数据称，截至周三的一周内，投资者抛售美国股票和房地产股票，买入中国股票，称资金流入中国可能是由中国公共基金推动的。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾称与美国在南海举行联合演习
item.description: The Philippines and the United States conducted joint maritime exercises in the South China Sea on Friday, the Philippine military said, the latest round of drills underlining ongoing expansion of their defence ties.翻译:菲律宾军方表示，菲律宾和美国周五在南海举行了联合海上演习，最新一轮演习凸显了两国防务关系的持续扩展。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 资生堂利润下滑，中国消费者低迷又成为受害者
item.description: Shiseido became the latest victim on Friday of a slowing Chinese economy that has battered earnings at many global consumer goods companies, when the Japanese cosmetics maker reported a 40% slide in annual earnings.翻译:上周五，资生堂成为中国经济放缓的最新受害者，这家日本化妆品制造商报告称，其年收益下滑了 40%，中国经济放缓已经打击了许多全球消费品公司的盈利。
item.author: Rocky Swift

item.title: 政策支持下1月份银行新增贷款创历史新高
item.description: New bank loans in China jumped by more than expected to an all-time high in January, as the central bank moved to shore up the sputtering economy, reinforcing expectations for more stimulus in the coming months.翻译:随着央行采取行动提振陷入困境的经济，中国一月份新增银行贷款增幅超出预期，创历史新高，强化了未来几个月出台更多刺激措施的预期。
item.author: Judy Hua, Kevin Yao

item.title: 梅西在中国的影响力越来越大，杭州队取消了阿根廷友谊赛
item.description: Chinese sporting authorities have cancelled next month's friendly international between Argentina and Nigeria amid a growing backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in an Inter Miami match in Hong Kong last week.翻译:由于莱昂内尔·梅西上周未能参加国际迈阿密在香港举行的比赛，中国体育当局取消了下个月阿根廷和尼日利亚之间的国际友谊赛。
item.author: Farah Master, Jessie Pang

item.title: 爱马仕销售额超过奢侈品竞争对手，股价创历史新高
item.description: Hermes said it will further raise prices as its sales outpaced luxury competitors at the end of 2023, helping to lift shares in the Birkin bag maker to a record high.翻译:爱马仕表示，由于其销量将在 2023 年底超过奢侈品竞争对手，因此将进一步提高价格，从而帮助这家柏金包制造商的股价升至历史新高。
item.author: Mimosa Spencer

item.title: 随着中国经济困境加剧，投资银行准备迎接更多亚洲裁员
item.description: Job cuts at Western investment banks in Asia are expected to increase this year as revenue pressures rise due to deepening economic and market turmoil in China, even as deal prospects brighten in Japan and India, headhunters and bankers said.翻译:猎头公司和银行家表示，尽管日本和印度的交易前景光明，但由于中国经济和市场动荡加剧，收入压力加大，亚洲西方投行今年的裁员预计将增加。
item.author: Kane Wu, Selena Li

item.title: 百度与联想达成第三笔中国人工智能智能手机交易
item.description: China's Baidu has partnered with Lenovo to feature its generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology on Lenovo's smartphones, in the latest team up with a phone manufacturer as it seeks practical applications for its AI model.翻译:中国的百度与联想合作，在联想的智能手机上展示其生成式人工智能（AI）技术，这是与一家手机制造商的最新合作，旨在为其人工智能模型寻求实际应用。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 独家：杜克能源将把中国电池巨头宁德时代从海军陆战队基地撤出
item.description: Under pressure from Congress, U.S. utility company Duke Energy plans to decommission energy-storage batteries produced by Chinese battery maker CATL at one of the nation's largest Marine Corps bases and will phase out CATL products at its civilian projects, the company confirmed to Reuters.翻译:美国公用事业公司杜克能源向路透社证实，在国会的压力下，该公司计划退役中国电池制造商宁德时代在美国最大的海军陆战队基地之一生产的储能电池，并将在其民用项目中逐步淘汰宁德时代的产品。
item.author: Michael Martina

item.title: 由于债券收益率上升削弱了吸引力，金价每周下跌
item.description: Gold slipped on Friday and was heading for a weekly fall, pressured by elevated Treasury yields, while investors awaited next week's U.S. inflation data for more clues on the timing of the Federal Reserve's interest rate cuts.翻译:受国债收益率上升的压力，金价周五下跌，并有望周线下跌，而投资者则等待下周的美国通胀数据，以获取有关美联储降息时机的更多线索。
item.author: Anushree Mukherjee

item.title: 中国新年旅游高峰进入高潮，中国增加了创纪录的火车数量
item.description: China on Friday kicked into high gear on the eve of the annual Lunar New Year holiday, with travellers cramming onto trains and planes to head back to their hometowns and families preparing for traditional reunion dinner gatherings.翻译:周五，中国在一年一度的农历新年假期前夕进入了高潮，旅客们挤上火车和飞机返回家乡，与家人一起准备传统的团圆饭聚会。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着对中国的担忧加深，日产股价出现二十年来最大跌幅
item.description: Shares in Nissan Motor tumbled 12% on Friday, their biggest decline in more than two decades, after quarterly earnings undershot expectations by a large margin and it cut estimates for car sales due to stiff competition in China.翻译:日产汽车 (Nissan Motor) 的季度盈利大幅低于预期，并因中国竞争激烈而下调了汽车销量预期，周五该公司股价暴跌 12%，创二十多年来最大跌幅。
item.author: Daniel Leussink
